title: Hotel Management and Booking Application
description: The Hotel Management & Booking App is designed to streamline the process of managing hotels and bookings. It offers a seamless experience for both customers and hotel administrators. The app will handle room availability, booking management, user authentication, payment processing, and hotel administration.

title: Employee Management System - CRUD Application using Springboot and React
description: The Employee Management System is a CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) application built using React.js for the frontend and Spring Boot for the backend. It allows businesses to manage employee information efficiently, including personal details, job roles, and departments.

title: RealEstate Responsive Web Application
description: Our Real Estate Website is a dynamic and user-friendly platform designed to streamline the property buying, selling, and renting processes. Built with React.js, the site offers a seamless and interactive experience for users looking to explore real estate options.

title: Personal Porfolio Website
description: Build a personal portfolio to show my experiences,skills,and complete info.
